I2c_XferParams Struct Reference

I2C Transfer Params. More...

#include <i2c.h>

Detailed Description

I2C Transfer Params.

This structure holds the information needed to carry out a transaction on I2C bus to a slave device.

Field Documentation

uint8_t* I2c_XferParams::buffer

Data buffer

uint32_t I2c_XferParams::bufLen

Length of buffer

uint32_t I2c_XferParams::flags

Flags to indicate the various modes of operation

void* I2c_XferParams::param

Extra parameter for future use

uint8_t I2c_XferParams::slaveAddr

Address of the slave to talk to, not valid in Slave mode

uint32_t I2c_XferParams::timeout

Timeout value
